subject: Using the quickscript_junior_keyboard_windows program
msgSnippet: Greetings! I am currently trying out the quickscript_junior_keyboard_windows program found in our files area.  It s been very convenient for typing up my own
messageBody:
Greetings!

I am currently trying out the quickscript_junior_keyboard_windows
program found in our files area. It's been very convenient for
typing up my own notes and documents. I have several questions,
though:

The version I have pulled down is a "BETA" copy. The first section
of the readme file indicates new versions should be obtained
frequently. Are there new versions available? If so, where can I
get them?

I have ThothUni loaded and working fine when using that program.
The readme indicates "Ctrl ." should be used for the naming dot. I
cannot get this to work. Have I missed a step somewhere?

Is this the right avenue to pursue for typing things in
Quickscript? Are there other programs or tools available for usage
out there? I do like the ability to quickly switch between
Quickscript and Latin available in this application.

Thanks for your help!
